All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Asset
The Asset class represents a financial asset in the domain.
Exchange
The Exchange class represents the exchange entity.
ExchangeException
The ExchangeException class represents an exception that is thrown when an error occurs during the initialization or use of a Exchange object
ExchangeType
Enumerates the different types of exchange.
ForExchangeCommunication
Output port used to retrieve information from an exchange.
ForTriangularArbitraging
Interface exposing methods to perform triangular arbitrage.
Order
The Order class represents a trading order for a specific pair of assets on an exchange.
OrderStatus
Enumerates the different possible status for an order.
OrderType
Enumerates the different types of order.
Pair
The Pair class represents a trading pair consisting of two financial assets.
PairNullAssetException
Exception thrown when an Asset is missing when creating a Pair.
PairSameAssetException
Exception thrown when the two Asset used to create a Pair are the same.
TriangularArbitrage
The TriangularArbitrage class implements the logic for performing triangular arbitrage on given asset pairs and exchange.
TriangularArbitragingException
Error thrown if an error occurs when performing triangular arbitrage.
